IRS990EZ.PrimaryExemptPurposeTxt: THE PURPOSE OF THE EC (EAST COWETA) GRIDIRON CLUB IS TO PROMOTE THE DEVELOPMENT AND MAINTENANCE OF THE SPORT OF FOOTBALL AT EAST COWETA HIGH SCHOOL IN SHARPSBURG, GA. SPECIFICALLY, THIS ORGANIZATION PROMOTES ACADEMIC ACHIEVEMENT AND LEADERSHIP QUALITIES AMONG THE PLAYERS. IT WILL COOPERATE WITH AND SUPPORT THE COACHING AND ADMINISTRATIVE STAFFS OF EAST COWETA HIGH SCHOOL. THE ORGANIZATION WILL ALSO FOSTER SCHOOL SPIRIT AMONG THE STUDENTS, FACULTY, PARENTS, AND THE COMMUNITY. IT WILL ENCOURAGE RECOGNITION OF FOOTBALL, THE PLAYERS, COACHES, AND THE EAST COWETA HIGH SCHOOL FOOTBALL PROGRAM AND ENHANCE COMMUNICATION AMONG COACHES, PARENTS, AND TEAM MEMBERS. FINALLY, THE ORGANIZATION WILL SUPPORT SUPPLEMENTARY ITEMS AND EQUIPMENT THAT COACHES AND THIS ORGANIZATION HAVE AGREED WILL ENHANCE THE FOOTBALL PROGRAM AND SPONSOR PROGRAMS TO FURTHER FINANCIAL SUPPORT OF THE TEAM AND DEVELOPMENT OF INDIVIDUAL PLAYERS.

ProgramSrvcAccomplishmentGrp.DescriptionProgramSrvcAccomTxt: EC GRIDIRON CLUB FEELS IT IS IMPORTANT TO SUPPORT THE PURCHASE OF PLAYER GEAR AND EQUIPMENT. SPONSORING PLAYER GEAR AND EQUIPMENT FULFILLS OUR MISSION BECAUSE IT PROMOTES TEAM DEVELOPMENT AND INDIVIDUAL PLAYER DEVELOPMENT. WE FEEL IN THE GAME OF FOOTBALL EQUIPMENT IS CRUCIAL TO SAFETY. FOR A TEAM OR PLAYER TO FULLY DEVELOP THEY MUST FEEL AND STAY SAFE TO THE BEST OF THEIR ABILITY FIRST. IT ALSO PROMOTES SCHOOL SPIRIT BY PROVIDING THE TEAM WITH PLAYER GEAR WITH THEIR SCHOOL LOGO AND PLAYER NUMBER ON IT.

SUPPORTING SUPPLEMENTARY ITEMS FOR COACHES THAT HAVE BEEN AGREED UPON BY COACHES, PARENTS, AND BOARD MEMBERS ARE CRUCIAL ELEMENTS OF OUR SPONSORSHIP BY THE EC GRIDIRON CLUB. UP-TO-DATE SAFETY CONCERNS FOR PLAYERS AND EQUIPMENT ARE A TOP PRIORITY. EDUCATIONAL CLINICS PROVIDE MOST OF THAT INFORMATION. IN TODAY'S TIME, TECHNOLOGY TRAINING IS IMPORTANT AS IT RELATES TO SAFETY AND SCHOLARSHIPS AS WELL. THE GAME OF FOOTBALL CHANGES YEARLY IN THIS CATEGORY. TO ENHANCE INDIVIDUAL AND TEAM PLAYERS GETTING RECRUITED, FURTHERING THEIR EDUCATION WITH HUDL AND SIDELINE KITS, THE COACHES NEED CLINICS AND TRAINING YEARLY. WE ARE PROUD TO SPONSOR IN THESE CATEGORIES.

EC GRIDIRON CLUB FEELS FOR A PROGRAM TO BE SUCCESSFUL IT MUST SUPPORT AND ENCOURAGE COACHES AND ADMINISTRATIVE STAFF. THE COACHES WORK HARD SPENDING A MAJORITY OF THEIR DAY PROMOTING, TEACHING, AND DEVELOPING THE PLAYERS AND THE PROGRAM. IT IS AN HONOR AS A FOOTBALL COMMUNITY TO SHOW OUR APPRECIATION BY PROVIDING ANNUAL COACHES GIFTS.
OTHER PURPOSES AS DIRECTED BY THE BOARD

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FALL GAME COST OF GOODS SOLD 2,850 SPRING GAME COST OF GOODS SOLD 2,502 EXPENSES ADVERTISING 364 OFFICE SUPPLIES 194 BANK FEES 90 COMPUTER/ SOFTWARE EXPENSES 505 MEALS FOR PLAYERS 7,531 UNIFORMS 33,145 COACHES GIFTS 39,500 OTHER ATHLETIC FUNCTIONS 4,494 SIGNING DAY EXPENSES 69 GEAR AND EQUIPMENT 6,642 BUSINESS GIFTS 2,309 FACILITIES AND EQUIP 15,200 OTHER PLAYER EXPENSES 6,350 TOTAL 121,745

THE PURPOSE OF THE EC (EAST COWETA) GRIDIRON CLUB IS TO PROMOTE THE DEVELOPMENT AND MAINTENANCE OF THE SPORT OF FOOTBALL AT EAST COWETA HIGH SCHOOL IN SHARPSBURG, GA. SPECIFICALLY, THIS ORGANIZATION PROMOTES ACADEMIC ACHIEVEMENT AND LEADERSHIP QUALITIES AMONG THE PLAYERS. IT WILL COOPERATE WITH AND SUPPORT THE COACHING AND ADMINISTRATIVE STAFFS OF EAST COWETA HIGH SCHOOL. THE ORGANIZATION WILL ALSO FOSTER SCHOOL SPIRIT AMONG THE STUDENTS, FACULTY, PARENTS, AND THE COMMUNITY. IT WILL ENCOURAGE RECOGNITION OF FOOTBALL, THE PLAYERS, COACHES, AND THE EAST COWETA HIGH SCHOOL FOOTBALL PROGRAM AND ENHANCE COMMUNICATION AMONG COACHES, PARENTS, AND TEAM MEMBERS. FINALLY, THE ORGANIZATION WILL SUPPORT SUPPLEMENTARY ITEMS AND EQUIPMENT THAT COACHES AND THIS ORGANIZATION HAVE AGREED WILL ENHANCE THE FOOTBALL PROGRAM AND SPONSOR PROGRAMS TO FURTHER FINANCIAL SUPPORT OF THE TEAM AND DEVELOPMENT OF INDIVIDUAL PLAYERS.

EC GRIDIRON CLUB FEELS IT IS IMPORTANT TO SUPPORT THE PURCHASE OF PLAYER GEAR AND EQUIPMENT. SPONSORING PLAYER GEAR AND EQUIPMENT FULFILLS OUR MISSION BECAUSE IT PROMOTES TEAM DEVELOPMENT AND INDIVIDUAL PLAYER DEVELOPMENT. WE FEEL IN THE GAME OF FOOTBALL EQUIPMENT IS CRUCIAL TO SAFETY. FOR A TEAM OR PLAYER TO FULLY DEVELOP THEY MUST FEEL AND STAY SAFE TO THE BEST OF THEIR ABILITY FIRST. IT ALSO PROMOTES SCHOOL SPIRIT BY PROVIDING THE TEAM WITH PLAYER GEAR WITH THEIR SCHOOL LOGO AND PLAYER NUMBER ON IT.

SUPPORTING SUPPLEMENTARY ITEMS FOR COACHES THAT HAVE BEEN AGREED UPON BY COACHES, PARENTS, AND BOARD MEMBERS ARE CRUCIAL ELEMENTS OF OUR SPONSORSHIP BY THE EC GRIDIRON CLUB. UP-TO-DATE SAFETY CONCERNS FOR PLAYERS AND EQUIPMENT ARE A TOP PRIORITY. EDUCATIONAL CLINICS PROVIDE MOST OF THAT INFORMATION. IN TODAY'S TIME, TECHNOLOGY TRAINING IS IMPORTANT AS IT RELATES TO SAFETY AND SCHOLARSHIPS AS WELL. THE GAME OF FOOTBALL CHANGES YEARLY IN THIS CATEGORY. TO ENHANCE INDIVIDUAL AND TEAM PLAYERS GETTING RECRUITED, FURTHERING THEIR EDUCATION WITH HUDL AND SIDELINE KITS, THE COACHES NEED CLINICS AND TRAINING YEARLY. WE ARE PROUD TO SPONSOR IN THESE CATEGORIES.

EC GRIDIRON CLUB FEELS FOR A PROGRAM TO BE SUCCESSFUL IT MUST SUPPORT AND ENCOURAGE COACHES AND ADMINISTRATIVE STAFF. THE COACHES WORK HARD SPENDING A MAJORITY OF THEIR DAY PROMOTING, TEACHING, AND DEVELOPING THE PLAYERS AND THE PROGRAM. IT IS AN HONOR AS A FOOTBALL COMMUNITY TO SHOW OUR APPRECIATION BY PROVIDING ANNUAL COACHES GIFTS.
